content: परिभ्रम् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To rove, wander about, ramble, move to and fro; परिभ्रमसि किं वृथा क्वचन चित्त विश्रम्यताम् <ls>Bh. 3. 137.</ls> {@--2@} To hover, whirl round; परिभ्रमन्मूर्धजषट्पदाकुलैः <ls>Ki. 5. 14.</ls> {@--3@} To revolve, rotate, move or turn round. {@--4@} To wander or roam over (with <ab>acc.</ab>); भुवं परिबभ्राम. {@--5@} To turn round (anything), circumambulate. {@--6@} To encircle. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To bewilder, overwhelm, overpower; <ls>U. 3. 32.</ls>
